user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page AND has a registered account
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to dashboard AND session is created

test_cases.title: Login fails with invalid password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed AND user remains on login page

test_cases.title: Login fails with non-existent email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Account not found' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products

test_cases.title: Add single item to empty cart
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page AND cart is empty
test_cases.expected_result: Item is added to cart AND cart count shows 1 AND success message appears

test_cases.title: Add multiple quantities of same item
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page
test_cases.expected_result: Cart shows 3 units of the product AND total price is calculated correctly

test_cases.title: Add item when out of stock
test_cases.preconditions: Product is marked as out of stock
steps: Attempt to click 'Add to Cart' button
test_cases.expected_result: 'Add to Cart' button is disabled AND message 'Out of Stock' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to delete user accounts so that I can remove inactive or banned users

test_cases.title: Successful account deletion
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND viewing user management page
steps: Click delete on a user account
test_cases.expected_result: User account is removed from database AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Cancel deletion operation
test_cases.expected_result: Account remains unchanged AND user is returned to management page

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to search for products by name or category so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly

test_cases.title: Search with single keyword
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page AND products with keyword exist
test_cases.expected_result: Search results display all products matching 'laptop' AND result count is shown

test_cases.title: Search returns no results
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
steps: Enter search term that has no matches
test_cases.expected_result: Message 'No products found' is displayed AND suggestions are provided

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are current and accurate

test_cases.title: Update first name successfully
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: First name is updated AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Update email address
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: Verification email is sent AND user is prompted to verify new email

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it

test_cases.title: Initiate password reset with valid email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on login page AND cannot remember password
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears AND password reset email is sent

test_cases.title: Reset password with new valid password
test_cases.preconditions: User has valid password reset link
test_cases.expected_result: Password is updated AND user is redirected to login

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to view my order history so that I can track previous purchases

test_cases.title: View order history list
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND has made purchases
test_cases.expected_result: All past orders are displayed with order number, date, AND total

test_cases.title: View order details
test_cases.preconditions: User is on order history page
test_cases.expected_result: Order details display items, quantities, prices, shipping address

user_stories.user_story: As a shopper, I want to apply discount codes so that I can receive discounts on my purchases

test_cases.title: Apply valid discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart AND valid code exists
test_cases.expected_result: Discount is applied AND cart total is reduced AND confirmation message shown

test_cases.title: Apply invalid discount code
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid coupon code' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences so that I receive only relevant communications

test_cases.title: Enable email notifications
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page AND email is disabled
test_cases.expected_result: Email notifications are enabled AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Disable SMS notifications
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page AND SMS is enabled
test_cases.expected_result: SMS notifications are disabled AND confirmation message appears

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to upload product images so that customers can see what they're buying

test_cases.title: Upload single product image
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on product upload page
test_cases.expected_result: Image is uploaded AND displayed in product gallery

test_cases.title: Upload image with oversized file
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on product upload page
steps: Attempt to upload image larger than 10MB
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'File size exceeds limit' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to filter products by price range so that I can find items within my budget

test_cases.title: Filter by minimum price
test_cases.preconditions: User is on product listing page
test_cases.expected_result: Only products priced $50 or more are displayed

test_cases.title: Filter by maximum price
test_cases.preconditions: User is on product listing page
test_cases.expected_result: Only products priced $200 or less are displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to leave product reviews so that I can share my experience with other buyers

test_cases.title: Submit product review
test_cases.preconditions: User has purchased product AND is on product page
test_cases.expected_result: Review is submitted AND displayed on product page

test_cases.title: Submit review with empty text
test_cases.preconditions: User is on review submission page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Review text is required' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to save favorite products to my wishlist so that I can revisit them later

test_cases.title: Add product to wishlist
steps: Click heart icon to add to wishlist
test_cases.expected_result: Product is added to wishlist AND heart icon is highlighted

test_cases.title: View wishlist items
test_cases.expected_result: All wishlist items are displayed with prices AND availability

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to track my shipment so that I know when my order will arrive

test_cases.title: View tracking information
test_cases.expected_result: Tracking number AND estimated delivery date are displayed

test_cases.title: Receive shipping notification
test_cases.expected_result: Email is received with tracking link AND carrier information

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to manage product inventory so that I can track stock levels

test_cases.title: Update inventory quantity
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on inventory management page
test_cases.expected_result: Inventory is updated AND system reflects new quantity

test_cases.title: Receive low stock alert
test_cases.expected_result: Alert notification is sent to vendor

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to checkout securely so that my payment information is protected

test_cases.title: Complete checkout with valid payment
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart AND on checkout page
test_cases.expected_result: Order is confirmed AND order number is displayed

test_cases.title: Checkout with declined card
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Payment declined' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to change shipping address before checkout so that items are sent to correct location

test_cases.title: Change shipping address
test_cases.expected_result: Shipping address is updated AND reflected on order summary

test_cases.title: Verify address validation
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please complete address' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to apply gift cards to my purchase so that I can use promotional credits

test_cases.title: Apply valid gift card
test_cases.preconditions: User has gift card AND items in cart
test_cases.expected_result: Gift card balance is deducted AND cart total updated

test_cases.title: Apply expired gift card
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Gift card expired' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view customer analytics so that I can understand buying patterns

test_cases.title: View sales dashboard
test_cases.expected_result: Dashboard displays total sales, orders, AND revenue

test_cases.title: Filter analytics by date range
test_cases.expected_result: Analytics update to show data for selected period

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to contact customer support so that I can resolve issues quickly

test_cases.title: Submit support ticket
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket is created AND confirmation message shows ticket number

test_cases.title: View support ticket status
test_cases.expected_result: Ticket status AND history are displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to export my account data so that I can backup my information

test_cases.title: Export account data
test_cases.preconditions: User is on account settings page
test_cases.expected_result: CSV file is generated AND downloaded containing user data

test_cases.title: Export without selecting data types
steps: Click export without selecting any data types
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please select data to export' is displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to enable two-factor authentication so that my account is more secure

test_cases.title: Enable 2FA with authenticator app
test_cases.preconditions: User is on security settings page
steps: Scan QR code with authenticator app
test_cases.expected_result: 2FA is enabled AND backup codes are provided

test_cases.title: Disable 2FA
test_cases.expected_result: 2FA is disabled AND warning message shown

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to set up subscription renewals so that I don't run out of products

test_cases.title: Create subscription
test_cases.expected_result: Subscription is created AND discount is applied

test_cases.title: Cancel subscription
test_cases.expected_result: Subscription is cancelled AND confirmation email sent

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to set promotional pricing so that I can run sales campaigns

test_cases.title: Create promotional pricing
test_cases.expected_result: Promotion is created AND applied to product

test_cases.title: End promotion early
test_cases.expected_result: Promotion ends AND price reverts to regular

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to compare products side by side so that I can make informed decisions

test_cases.title: Add products to comparison
test_cases.preconditions: User is on product listing page
test_cases.expected_result: Comparison view shows products side by side with specs

test_cases.title: Remove product from comparison
test_cases.expected_result: Product is removed AND comparison updates

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to view product recommendations so that I can discover new items

test_cases.title: View personalized recommendations
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND has purchase history
test_cases.expected_result: Recommendations based on browsing AND purchase history are shown

test_cases.title: View trending products
test_cases.expected_result: Top trending products are displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to respond to customer reviews so that I can address concerns

test_cases.title: Reply to customer review
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on product reviews page
test_cases.expected_result: Response is posted AND shown under review

test_cases.title: Edit vendor response
test_cases.expected_result: Response is updated AND edit timestamp shown

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to create a profile picture so that other users can recognize me

test_cases.title: Upload profile picture
test_cases.expected_result: Profile picture is updated AND displayed

test_cases.title: Crop profile picture
steps: Use crop tool to adjust image
test_cases.expected_result: Image is cropped AND preview shown

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage product categories so that I can organize inventory

test_cases.title: Create new product category
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is on category management page
test_cases.expected_result: Category is created AND appears in category list

test_cases.title: Delete product category
test_cases.expected_result: Category is deleted AND no longer available

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to filter reviews by rating so that I can see specific feedback

test_cases.title: Filter reviews by star rating
test_cases.preconditions: User is on product reviews page
test_cases.expected_result: Only 5-star reviews are displayed

test_cases.title: Filter reviews with multiple ratings
test_cases.expected_result: Reviews with 4 or 5 stars are displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to link my social media accounts so that I can sign in easily

test_cases.title: Link Facebook account
test_cases.preconditions: User is on account settings page
test_cases.expected_result: Facebook account is linked AND shown in connected accounts

test_cases.title: Unlink social account
test_cases.expected_result: Social account is unlinked

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to create product bundles so that I can increase sales

test_cases.title: Create product bundle
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on bundle management page
test_cases.expected_result: Bundle is created AND available for purchase

test_cases.title: Edit bundle contents
test_cases.expected_result: Bundle contents are updated

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to receive personalized email campaigns so that I see relevant offers

test_cases.title: Receive personalized email offer
test_cases.preconditions: Customer has purchase history AND opted in
test_cases.expected_result: Email is received with relevant product recommendations

test_cases.title: Unsubscribe from email campaign
test_cases.expected_result: Customer is unsubscribed AND receives confirmation

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to generate sales reports so that I can analyze business performance

test_cases.title: Generate monthly sales report
test_cases.expected_result: Report is generated AND available for download

test_cases.title: Export report as PDF
test_cases.expected_result: PDF file is downloaded

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to pay in installments so that I can afford larger purchases

test_cases.title: Select installment payment option
test_cases.expected_result: Installment plan is applied AND payment schedule shown

test_cases.title: View installment payment schedule
test_cases.expected_result: All scheduled payments are displayed with due dates

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to manage shipping settings so that I can set accurate delivery times

test_cases.title: Set shipping rates by region
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on shipping settings page
test_cases.expected_result: Shipping rate is updated AND applied to products

test_cases.title: Set free shipping threshold
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on shipping settings page
test_cases.expected_result: Orders over $100 qualify for free shipping

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to print my invoice so that I have a physical copy

test_cases.title: Print order invoice
test_cases.expected_result: Invoice is printed with all order details

test_cases.title: Print invoice without browser print dialog
test_cases.expected_result: Browser print dialog opens

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage staff accounts so that I can control access levels

test_cases.title: Create staff account
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is on staff management page
test_cases.expected_result: Staff account is created AND invitation sent

test_cases.title: Change staff role
test_cases.expected_result: Staff role is updated AND access level changed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to view my account balance so that I know my store credit

test_cases.title: View account balance
test_cases.expected_result: Current balance is displayed

test_cases.title: View balance transaction history
test_cases.expected_result: All balance transactions are displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to set product variants so that customers can choose options

test_cases.title: Add product variants
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on product edit page
test_cases.expected_result: Product variants are created AND available for purchase

test_cases.title: Set variant-specific pricing
test_cases.expected_result: Variant has unique price

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to see product availability in nearby stores so that I can pick up items

test_cases.title: Check store availability
test_cases.expected_result: Nearby stores with stock are displayed

test_cases.title: Reserve product at store
test_cases.preconditions: User has found item in store
test_cases.expected_result: Product is reserved AND confirmation shown

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to manage my delivery addresses so that I can ship to multiple locations

test_cases.title: Add new delivery address
test_cases.preconditions: User is on address management page
test_cases.expected_result: Address is added AND available for checkout

test_cases.title: Set default delivery address
test_cases.expected_result: Address is set as default for future orders

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view system logs so that I can monitor platform activity

test_cases.title: View activity logs
test_cases.expected_result: Logs display all system activities with timestamps

test_cases.title: Export logs
test_cases.expected_result: Log file is generated AND downloaded

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to receive order alerts so that I'm informed about status changes

test_cases.title: Receive order confirmation alert
test_cases.expected_result: Order confirmation alert is received

test_cases.title: Receive shipping alert
test_cases.expected_result: Shipping notification is received with tracking info

user_stories.user_story: As a vendor, I want to customize my storefront so that my brand stands out

test_cases.title: Upload store banner
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on store settings page
test_cases.expected_result: Banner is displayed at top of storefront

test_cases.title: Customize store description
test_cases.preconditions: Vendor is on store settings page
test_cases.expected_result: Description is updated AND displayed

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to use voice search so that I can find products faster

test_cases.title: Search using voice command
test_cases.preconditions: User is on search page AND microphone enabled
test_cases.expected_result: Voice input is converted to search AND results displayed

test_cases.title: Voice search with unclear audio
steps: Speak unclearly OR in noisy environment
test_cases.expected_result: System asks for confirmation OR clarification

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to schedule purchases so that I can receive items on specific dates

test_cases.title: Schedule order delivery
test_cases.expected_result: Order is scheduled for selected date

test_cases.title: Reschedule order
test_cases.expected_result: Delivery date is updated

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage banner promotions so that I can highlight offers

test_cases.title: Create promotional banner
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is on banner management page
test_cases.expected_result: Banner is created AND displayed on homepage

test_cases.title: Schedule banner display
test_cases.expected_result: Banner displays during scheduled period

user_stories.user_story: As a customer, I want to join loyalty program so that I can earn rewards

test_cases.title: Enroll in loyalty program
test_cases.expected_result: User is enrolled AND receives welcome bonus points

test_cases.title: View loyalty points balance
test_cases.preconditions: User is enrolled in loyalty program
test_cases.expected_result: Current points AND redemption options are displayed
